Verses: 1 nebugaadhnechchaar Raajyabaarampannum Irandaam Varushaththile, Nebugaadhnechchaar Soppanangalaik Kandaan; Adhinaal, Avanudaiya Aavi Kalangi, Avanudaiya Niththirai Kalaindhadhu.

2 appozhudhu Raajaa Than Soppanangalaith Thanakkuth Therivikkumporuttu Saasthirigalaiyum Josiyaraiyum Sooniyakkaararaiyum Kaldheyaraiyum Azhaikkachchonnaan; Avargal Vandhu, Raajasamugaththil Nindraargal.
3 raajaa Avargalai Nokki: Oru Soppanam Kanden; Andha Soppanaththai Ariyavendumendru En Aavi Kalangiyirukkiradhu Endraan.
4 appozhudhu Kaldheyar Raajaavai Nokki: Raajaave, Neer Endrum Vaazhga; Soppanaththai Umadhu Adiyaarukku Sollum, Appozhudhu Adhin Arththaththai Viduvippom Endru Seeriyabaashaiyile Sonnaargal.

5 raajaa Kaldheyarukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Ennidaththilirundhu Pirakkira Theermaanam Ennavendraal, Neengal Soppanaththaiyum Adhin Arththaththaiyum Enakku Ariviyaamarponaal Thundiththuppodappaduveergal; Ungal Veedugal Erukkalangalaakkappadum.

6 soppanaththaiyum Adhin Arththaththaiyum Theriviththeergaleyaagil, Ennidaththil Vegumadhigalaiyum Parisugalaiyum Migundha Ganaththaiyum Peruveergal; Aagaiyaal Soppanaththaiyum Adhin Arththaththaiyum Enakkuth Theriviyungal Endraan.
7 avargal Marupadiyum Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Raajaa Adiyaarukku Soppanaththai Solvaaraaga; Appozhudhu Adhin Arththaththai Viduvippom Endraargal.
8 adharku Raajaa Pradhiyuththaramaaga Ennidaththilirundhu Theermaanam Pirandhapadiyinaale Neengal Kaalathaamadhampannappaarkkireergalendru Nichchayamaaga Enakkuth Theriyavarugiradhu.

9 kaalam Maarumendru Neengal Enakkumunbaaga Poiyum Purattumaana Viseshaththai Sollumpadi Eththanampanni Irukkireergal; Neengal Soppanaththai Enakkuth Therivikkaamarponaal, Ungal Ellaarukkum Indha Ore Theerppu Pirandhirukkiradhu; Aagaiyaal Soppanaththai Enakku Sollungal; Appozhudhu Adhin Arththaththaiyum Ungalaal Kaanbikkakkoodumendru Arindhukolluven Endraan.

10 kaldheyar Raajasamugaththil Pradhiyuththaramaaga; Raajaa Ketkum Kaariyaththai Arivikkaththakka Manushan Boomiyil Oruvanum Illai; Aagaiyaal Magaththuvamum Vallamaiyumaana Endha Raajaavum Ippadippatta Kaariyaththai Oru Saasthiriyinidaththilaavadhu Josiyanidaththilaavadhu Kaldheyanidaththilaavadhu Kettadhillai.
11 raajaa Ketkira Kaariyam Migavum Arumaiyaanadhu; Maamsamaayirukkiravargalode Vaasampannaadha Dhevargaleyozhiya Raajasamugaththil Adhai Arivikkaththakkavar Oruvarum Illai Endraargal.
12 idhinimiththam Raajaa Magaa Kobamum Ukkiramunkondu, Baabilonil Irukkira Ellaa Gnaanigalaiyum Kolaiseyyumpadi Kattalaiyittaan.
13 gnaanigalai Kolaiseyyavendumendra Kattalai Velippattapodhu Dhaaniyelaiyum Avan Thozharaiyum Kolaiseyyath Thedinaargal.
14 baabilonin Gnaanigalaik Kolaiseyyap Purappatta Raajaavinudaiya Thalaiyaarigalukku Adhipadhiyaagiya Aariyokode Dhaaniyel Yosanaiyum Buththiyumaaip Pesi:

15 indhak Kattalai Raajaavinaal Iththanai Avasaramaaip Pirandhadharkuk Kaaranam Enna Endru Raajaavin Servaikkaaranaagiya Aariyoginidaththil Kettaan; Appozhudhu Aariyogu Dhaaniyelukkuk Kaariyaththai Ariviththaan.
16 dhaaniyel Raajaavinidaththilpoi, Soppanaththin Arththaththai Raajaavukkuk Kaanbikkumpadith Thanakkuth Thavanai Kodukka Vinnappam Panninaan.

17 pinbu Dhaaniyel Than Veettukkuppoi, Thaanum Than Thozharum Baabilonin Matra Gnaanigalodekooda Azhiyaadhapadikku Indha Maraiporulaikkuriththup Paralogaththin Dhevanai Nokki, Irakkam Ketkiradharkaaga,
18 ananiyaa, Meeshaavel, Asariyaa Ennum Thannudaiya Thozharukku Indhak Kaariyaththai Ariviththaan.
19 pinbu Raakkaalaththil Dharisanaththile Dhaaniyelukku Maraiporul Velippaduththappattadhu; Appozhudhu Dhaaniyel Paralogaththin Dhevanai Sthoththiriththaan.
20 pinbu Dhaaniyel Sonnadhu: Dhevanudaiya Naamaththukku Endrendraikkumulla Sadhaakaalangalilum Sthoththiramundaavadhaaga; Gnaanamum Vallamaiyum Avarukke Uriyadhu.
21 avar Kaalangalaiyum Samayangalaiyum Maatrugiravar; Raajaakkalaith Thalli, Raajaakkalai Erpaduththugiravar; Gnaanigalukku Gnaanaththaiyum, Arivaaligalukku Arivaiyum Kodukkiravar.
22 avare Aazhamum Maraiporulumaanadhai Velippaduththugiravar; Irulilirukkiradhai Avar Arivaar; Velichcham Avaridaththil Thangum.

23 en Pidhaakkalin Dhevane, Neer Enakku Gnaanamum Vallamaiyum Koduththu, Naangal Ummidaththil Vendikkondadhai Ippozhudhu Enakku Ariviththu, Raajaavin Kaariyaththai Engalukkuth Theriviththapadiyinaal Ummaith Thudhiththup Pugazhugiren Endraan.

24 pinbu Dhaaniyel Baabilonin Gnaanigalai Azhikka Raajaa Kattalaiyitta Aariyoginidaththil Poi: Baabilonin Gnaanigalai Azhikkaadheyum, Ennai Raajaavin Munbaaga Azhaiththukkondupom; Raajaavukku Arththaththaith Therivippen Endru Sonnaan.

25 appozhudhu Aariyogu Dhaaniyelai Raajaavin Munbaagath Theeviramaai Azhaiththukkondupoi: Siraippattuvandha Yoodheyaa Dhesaththaaril Oru Purushanaik Kandupidiththen; Avan Raajaavukku Arththaththaith Therivippaan Endraan.
26 raajaa Peldheshaadhsaarennum Naamamulla Dhaaniyelai Nokki: Naan Kanda Soppanaththaiyum Adhin Arththaththaiyum Nee Enakku Arivikkakkoodumaa Endru Kettaan.
27 dhaaniyel Raajasamugaththil Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Raajaa Ketkira Maraiporulai Raajaavukkuth Therivikka Gnaanigalaalum, Josiyaraalum, Saasthirigalaalum, Kurisollugiravargalaalum Koodaadhu.

28 maraiporulgalai Velippaduththugira Paralogaththilirukkira Dhevan Kadaisinaatkalil Sambavippadhai Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaarukkuth Theriviththirukkiraar; Ummudaiya Soppanamum Umadhu Padukkaiyinmel Ummudaiya Thalaiyil Undaana Dharisanangalum Ennavendraal:

29 raajaave, Ummudaiya Padukkaiyinmel Neer Paduththirukkaiyil, Inimel Sambavikkappogiradhenna Engira Ninaivugal Umakkul Ezhumbitru; Appozhudhu Maraiporulgalai Velippaduththugiravar Sambavikkappogiradhai Umakkuth Theriviththaar.

30 uyirodirukkira Ellaaraippaarkkilum Enakku Adhiga Gnaanam Undenbadhinaale Alla; Arththam Raajaavukkuth Theriyavaravum, Ummudaiya Irudhayaththin Ninaivugalai Neer Ariyavum, Indha Maraiporul Enakku Veliyaakkappattadhu.
31 raajaave, Neer Oru Periya Silaiyaikkandeer; Andhap Periya Silai Migundha Pragaasamulladhaayirundhadhu; Adhu Umakku Edhire Nindradhu; Adhin Roobam Bayangaramaayirundhadhu.
32 andha Silaiyin Thalai Pasumponnum, Adhin Maarbum Adhin Buyangalum Velliyum, Adhin Vayirum Adhin Thodaiyum Vengalamum,
33 adhin Kaalgal Irumbum, Adhin Paadhangal Paadhi Irumbum Paadhi Kalimannumaayirundhadhu.
34 neer Paarththukkondirukkumpodhe, Kaigalaal Peyarkkappadaadha Oru Kal Peyarndhu Urunduvandhadhu; Adhu Andha Silaiyai Irumbum Kalimannumaagiya Adhin Paadhangalil Modhi Avaigalai Norukkippottadhu.

35 appozhudhu Andha Irumbum Kalimannum Vengalamum Velliyum Ponnum Egamaai Norungundu, Kodaikaalaththil Poradikkira Kalaththilirundhu Parandhupogira Padharaippolaayitru; Avaigalukku Oru Idamum Kidaiyaadhapadi Kaatru Avaigalai Adiththukkondupoyitru; Silaiyai Modhina Kallovendraal, Oru Periya Parvadhamaagi Boomiyaiyellaam Nirappitru.
36 soppanam Idhudhaan; Adhin Arththaththaiyum Raajasamugaththil Therivippom.
37 raajaave, Neer Raajaadhi Raajaavaayirukkireer; Paralogaththin Dhevan Umakku Raajareegaththaiyum Paraakkiramaththaiyum Vallamaiyaiyum Magimaiyaiyum Arulinaar.

38 sagala Idangalilumulla Manupuththiraraiyum Veliyin Mirugangalaiyum Aagaayaththup Paravaigalaiyum Avar Umadhu Kaiyil Oppukkoduththu, Ummai Avaigalaiyellaam Aalumpadi Seydhaar. Ponnaana Andhath Thalai Neere.
39 umakkuppiragu Umakkuk Keezhththaramaana Veroru Raajyam Thondrum; Pinbu Boomiyaiyellaam Aandukollum Vengalamaana Moondraam Raajyamondru Ezhumbum.

40 naalaavadhu Raajyam Irumbaippola Uramaayirukkum; Irumbu Ellaavatraiyum Eppadi Norukki Sinnapinnamaakkugiradho, Appadiye Idhu Norukkippodugira Irumbaipola Avaigalaiyellaam Norukkith Thagarththuppodum.

41 paadhangalum Kaalviralgalum Paadhikuyavanin Kalimannum, Paadhi Irumbumaayirukka Neer Kandeere, Andha Raajyam Pirikkappadum; Aagilum Kalimannode Irumbu Kalandhirukka Neer Kandapadiye Irumbinudaiya Urudhiyil Konjam Adhile Irukkum.
42 kaalviralgal Paadhi Irumbum Paadhi Kalimannumaayirundhadhu Ennavendraal, Andha Raajyam Orupangu Uyaramum Orupangu Nerisalumaayirukkum.

43 neer Irumbaik Kalimannode Kalandhadhaagak Kandeere, Avargal Matra Manusharode Sambandhankalappaargal; Aagilum Idho, Kalimannode Irumbu Kalavaadhadhupola Avargal Oruvarodoruvar Ottikkollaadhiruppaargal.

44 andha Raajaakkalin Naatkalile, Paralogaththin Dhevan Endrendraikkum Azhiyaadha Oru Raajyaththai Ezhumbappannuvaar; Andha Raajyam Vere Janaththukku Vidappaduvadhillai; Oru Kal Kaiyaalpeyarkkappadaamal Malaiyilirundhu Peyarndhu, Urunduvandhu, Irumbaiyum Vengalaththaiyum Kalimannaiyum Velliyaiyum Ponnaiyum Norukkinadhai Neer Kandeere, Appadiye Adhu Andha Raajyangalaiyellaam Norukki, Nirmoolamaakki, Thaano Endrendraikkum Nirkum.
45 inimel Sambavikkappogiradhai Magaa Dhevan Raajaavukkuth Theriviththirukkiraar; Soppanamaanadhu Nichchayam, Adhin Arththam Saththiyam Endraan.
46 appozhudhu Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Mugankuppura Vizhundhu, Dhaaniyelai Vanangi, Avanukkuk Kaanikkai Seluththavum Thoobankaattavum Kattalaiyittaan.

47 raajaa Dhaaniyelai Nokki: Nee Indha Maraiporulai Velippaduththinapadiyinaal, Meyyaai Ungal Dhevane Dhevargalukku Dhevanum, Raajaakkalukku Aandavarum, Maraiporulgalai Velippaduththugiravarumaayirukkiraar Endraan.

48 pinbu Raajaa Dhaaniyelaip Periyavanaakki, Avanukku Anegam Sirandha Vegumadhigalaik Koduththu, Avanai Baabilon Maagaanam Muzhudhukkum Adhipadhiyaagavum, Baabilonilulla Sagala Gnaanigalin Pradhaana Adhikaariyaagavum Niyamiththaan.

49 dhaaniyel Raajaavai Vendikkondadhinperil Avan Saadhraakkaiyum, Meshaakkaiyum, Aabedhnegovaiyum Baabilon Magaanagaraththuk Kaariyangalai Visaarikkumpadi Vaiththaan; Dhaaniyelovendraal Raajaavin Kolumandabaththil Irundhaan.
